post_detail.title: CODE.ORG
post_detail.description:
Execution:

Click 3X partnered with director Lesley Chilcott on 'Code Stars,' a short film promoting Code.org. The organization was founded by entrepreneur brothers Hadi and Ali Partozi to promote computer science education in every classroom in the U.S. Juan Delcan designed and creative directed, with animation byJustin Wolfson, Jason Price and Peter Ahern.
